translation.en: Hey. Hey, hey, hey. Hey. Listen to me. Listen.
You're not alone anymore, Ernest.
I'm right here with you every step of the way.
translation.it: Starò con te tutto il tempo.

translation.en: You got this.
Soon as word got out that
millions of taxpayers' dollars were being spent on woo-woo science,
translation.it: che milioni di dollari dei contribuenti venivano spesi per una "pseudoscienza",

translation.en: we were abruptly shut down,
and the agency threw me under the proverbial bus.
translation.it: e la CIA fece di me il proverbiale capro espiatorio.

translation.en: A sacrificial lamb.
It was soul-crushing.
But then along came Ernest.
translation.it: - Poi un giorno, ecco Ernest. - Ok.

translation.en: Okay. Thank you so much for coming over, but as you can see, we are busy.
translation.it: Grazie mille di essere venuta, ma come può vedere siamo impegnati.

translation.en: I'd like to see him. That's not gonna happen.
translation.it: - Vorrei vederlo. - Non se ne parla.

translation.en: I don't think you understand the gravity of your situation.
translation.it: Non credo comprendiate la gravità della situazione.

translation.en: These entities, they are dangerous. I'd like you to leave, please.
translation.it: - Queste entità sono pericolose. - Se ne vada, per favore.

translation.en: They may present kindly, but they are never who they say they are.
translation.it: Possono apparire affabili, ma non sono mai chi dicono di essere.

translation.en: -I'm not gonna ask you-- -Your son Kevin.
translation.it: - Non glielo chiederò… - Vostro figlio, Kevin.

translation.en: He's close to it. I've seen it in the videos. He's at risk!

translation.en: All right! That's enough! Now, get out!
This is a matter of national security. I have a right to be here.
translation.it: È una questione di sicurezza nazionale. Ho il diritto di stare qui.

translation.en: Then come back with a warrant.
But until that time, get the hell out of my house.
translation.it: Ma fino ad allora, stia fuori da casa mia.

translation.en: I'll be back. That's a promise.
It's him!
Shit!
Oh my God! It's him! It's Ernest! -It's him! -[crowd shouting]
translation.it: Oddio! È lui! È Ernest! È lui!

translation.en: [Joy] Shit!
Dick move! Come on.
In there!
-Hey! -Sorry!
[pants] Okay, whatever. Can you just make yourself invisible already?
translation.it: Ok, come ti pare. Puoi renderti invisibile adesso?

translation.en: [pants] What? Why didn't he do that sooner? I don't know. Come on. We gotta go.
translation.it: - Cosa? Perché non l'ha fatto prima? - Non lo so. Andiamo.

translation.en: This is bullshit.
Well… [moans] …I hate to remind you

translation.en: about a little thing called the Fourth Amendment.
translation.it: le ricordo che c'è una cosa chiamata quarto emendamento.

translation.en: They're harboring a terrorist.
I'm not sure a ghost would legally qualify as a terrorist.

translation.en: They'll make a mistake.
Careless people always do.
And when that happens…
we'll be ready.
Chuck E. Cheese is down the street, kiddos.

translation.en: Do you know this guy? He used to work here back in the day. This place has had over a dozen owners.
translation.it: - Lo conosce? Lavorava qui. - Questo posto ha avuto tanti proprietari.

translation.en: Can't we just look around for a minute?
Sweetie, I could lose my liquor license. You gotta go.
translation.it: Gioia, mi tolgono la licenza per gli alcolici. Andatevene.

translation.en: Come on. This is stupid. Let's just go.
Hey, wait.
Let me see that picture again.
There.
Oh my God.
See? There is a connection. I knew it.

translation.en: Hold on. You're that kid, aren't you? Uh, I'm sorry. I don't… I don't know what you're talking about.
translation.it: - Aspetta. Sei quel ragazzino, vero? - Non so di cosa parla, mi spiace.

translation.en: With the ghost in your house. It is you! Holy shit!
translation.it: Quello con il fantasma in casa. Sei tu!

translation.en: Okay, thank you for your time. We have to go.
You're a genius.
This Scheller guy has to know who Ernest really is.
translation.it: Questo Scheller sa di certo chi è Ernest.

translation.en: And to think that you doubted me. I never doubted you.
translation.it: - E pensare che hai dubitato di me. - Non ho mai dubitato di te.

translation.en: -Now we just have to find where he is. -[boy] Mom! There's a ghost over there!
translation.it: - Ora dobbiamo solo scoprire dov'è. - Mamma! Lì c'è un fantasma!

translation.en: [mother] That's nice, sweetie.
Ernest, what's wrong?
[echoing] Hi, Daddy.
[echoing] Junebug.
Shit. [screams] Mom!
Ernest, come on! We gotta go!
[Kevin on video] Ernest!
Ernest, come on! We gotta go!
I think a warrant just fell right into our lap.

translation.en: "Ernest The Not-So-Friendly Ghost."
"Paranormal Whacktivity." They think he's a monster now.
translation.it: “Un fantasma da legare." Ora pensano che sia un mostro!

translation.en: He saw something out there. Like he was remembering something.
translation.it: Ha visto qualcosa. Era come se stesse ricordando.

translation.en: Well, it looks like he's trying to kidnap Shirley Temple!
translation.it: Sembra che cerchi di rapire Shirley Temple!

translation.en: And why didn't you tell me he could go outside? That should've been my exclusive.
translation.it: E perché non mi hai detto che può uscire? Doveva essere la mia esclusiva.

translation.en: You're not listening to me.
He said a name, it was, uh, June something.
translation.it: Ha detto un nome. June qualcosa.

translation.en: -So what? -So maybe that's why he's stuck here.
translation.it: - E allora? - Forse è bloccato qui per quello.

translation.en: Something happened to him. Something bad.
translation.it: Gli è successo qualcosa. Qualcosa di brutto.

translation.en: Maybe if we help him remember more, he can, uh, cross over.
translation.it: Forse se lo aiutiamo a ricordare, potrà passare oltre.

translation.en: Cross over?
We don't want him to cross over, Kevin. We need him here with us.
translation.it: Non vogliamo che passi oltre, Kevin. Ci serve qui.

translation.en: You really don't give a shit about him, do you?
translation.it: Non te ne frega un cazzo di lui, vero?

translation.en: I give a shit about us! This is about our future.
translation.it: Me ne frega di noi! C'è in gioco il nostro futuro. L'università per Fulton e per te.

translation.en: This is about Fulton's college tuition. It's about yours.
translation.it: C'è in gioco il nostro futuro. L'università per Fulton e per te.

translation.en: Don't make this about us.
It's about you.
Always is. Hey, I'm not finished talking to you, man.
translation.it: - È sempre così. - Ehi, non ho finito di parlare con te.

translation.en: You didn't hear a word he said.
translation.it: Non lo sei stato a sentire.

translation.en: Hello, ladies.
Dude, I just hit 200K followers on Instagram. It's insane.
translation.it: Sono a 200.000 follower su Instagram, è pazzesco.

translation.en: [girl] Seriously?

translation.en: Everybody at school is so jealous, but I didn't choose to be this hot.
translation.it: - Sul serio? - A scuola sono tutti invidiosi. Ma non ho scelto io di essere così sexy

translation.en: I didn't choose to get famous like this.

translation.en: Come on. No, literally, a supplement company hit me up.
translation.it: o di diventare famoso, no? Ma dai. Mi ha contattato un brand d'integratori. Mi offrono 1000 dollari per post.

translation.en: They wanna pay me $1,000 per post.
translation.it: Mi ha contattato un brand d'integratori. Mi offrono 1000 dollari per post.

translation.en: -Hey, king. That's mental. -Yeah. Hey. Mmm…
[Fulton] You know I get recognized 'bout everywhere I go.
Fulton! What the hell is this?
-[officer] Freeze! -Hey, get out of my house!
Where's my babies? Kevin! Fulton!
translation.it: Dove sono i miei bambini? Kevin! Fulton!

translation.en: You get a cell tracing?
Negative. Both kids left their cell phones behind.
translation.it: Negativo. Hanno lasciato qui i telefoni.

translation.en: We have the boy's laptop. Doing a sweep on the hard drive.
translation.it: Abbiamo il PC del ragazzo, stiamo esaminando l'hard drive.

translation.en: Keep them around. They might come in handy.
I don't care who the hell you are. You need to understand this is my house.
translation.it: Non so chi siete e non m'importa, ma questa è casa mia

translation.en: I have the power. Do you hear me?
translation.it: e do io gli ordini, capito?

translation.en: Had. Past tense.
Who the hell are you?
I'm the guy in charge,
and if you're smart, you're gonna do exactly what we tell you.
translation.it: e se siete furbi, farete esattamente ciò che vi diremo.

translation.en: [Joy] So, according to the records I found, Scheller lives here, just outside of Tulsa,
translation.it: Stando ai documenti che ho trovato, Scheller abita qui, appena fuori Tulsa,

translation.en: which is about 400 miles from here, give or take.
translation.it: che è a circa 600 chilometri da qui.

translation.en: Shit. That's far.
We'll take driving shifts. We'll make it. [chuckles]
translation.it: Ci alterneremo alla guida. Si può fare.

translation.en: Okay. [chuckles] I appreciate the optimism.
You look… different.
-I do? -Yeah.
Being an outlaw suits you.
Thanks.
Um, we should… we should probably get going.
What?
That's beautiful.
[Frank on TV] Last night at 11:15 p.m.,
our son, Kevin Presley, and his friend, Joy Yoshino,
translation.it: nostro figlio, Kevin Presley, e la sua amica, Joy Yoshino,

translation.en: were abducted from our home by an entity known as Ernest.
translation.it: sono stati rapiti da casa nostra da un'entità conosciuta come Ernest.

translation.en: We're asking that anyone with information please contact your local authorities.
translation.it: Se avete informazioni, contattate le autorità locali, per favore.

translation.en: Asshole.
-You-- Energy drinks? -All we know is they were in their rooms.
translation.it: - Gli energy drink? - Erano nelle loro stanze.

translation.en: Last aisle, in the back.
-Thanks. -At 11:15, we checked.
translation.it: - Corsia in fondo. - Grazie. Alle 23:15 abbiamo controllato ed erano spariti.

translation.en: They were gone.
translation.it: Alle 23:15 abbiamo controllato ed erano spariti.

translation.en: Look at these. Come one. Try 'em. They'll look good on you.

translation.en: Yeah. Flick 'em down a little. Give some 'tude.

Look how good you look.
Crap!
What? Where are you?
Shit, this is bad.
Howdy, ghost boy.
[officer 1] Ma'am.
-Mind stepping out of the vehicle for me? -Me?
Son, I'm gonna need you to lay down and put your hands behind your head.

translation.en: Is there a problem, Officer? -Don't make me repeat myself now. -[gun cocks]

translation.en: Really sorry about this!
You have anything on you… Freeze!
Don't move! [pants] Ha… Hands up!
-Go, go, go, go, go. -[engine starts]
-[tires screech] -Oh my God. I kicked him in the nuts!

translation.en: -Where's Ernest? -I don't know!
-Hey, stop! -Go, go, go, go, go!
What in the hell are you doing?
-He just flipped me off! -Move your dumb ass!
translation.it: - Mi ha fatto il dito medio. - Muoviti!

translation.en: Shit.
I think we lost them.
-Oh shit! -Shit!
He's right behind us, Kevin!
-You got eyes on him yet? -Oh shit. This is really happening.
translation.it: - Lo vedi? - Cazzo, sta succedendo davvero.

translation.en: There! Turn there!
I've got him! Cut him off on the other side! Yeah!
translation.it: Gli sto addosso, tagliagli la strada. Sì!

translation.en: Shit, shit, shit, shit!
God! They're everywhere!
-Will they let us off if we pull over? -Are you crazy?
translation.it: - E se ci fermassimo? - Sei matta?

translation.en: Kicked me in my nuts, hit my car!
translation.it: Mi prendono a calci, mi vengono addosso…

translation.en: Oh shit!
Let go!
-Kevin! -I see him!
You wanna play chicken? Come on!
-Welcome back. -[tires screech]
You son of a…
The other one's coming.
Oh shit!
Holy shit, Ernest. What are you doing?
-Kevin, stop! -I can make it!
No, you can't! Stop! Kevin!
-Oh shit! -[horn blaring]
Oh shit!
Never do that again.
Get your ass back here!
Shit!
Where's he going?
We already told you. We don't know.

translation.en: You can't hold us here like animals. [sighs] When can I get my phone back?

translation.en: You know what? I've gotta go to the restroom.
Do I need permission to pee?

translation.en: Let her go.
Oh my goodness! I am so sorry! Are you okay?

translation.en: Mom.
Oh my God, Kevin. Are you okay? Yeah. Yeah, I'm fine.
translation.it: - Oh mio Dio, Kevin. Stai bene? - Sì, sto bene.

translation.en: Where are you?
I can't tell you, I'm sorry. But I'm safe. I promise.

translation.en: I think we might have found someone who can help Ernest.

translation.en: Okay. Listen to me. Just keep going.
You do whatever your heart tells you is right.
translation.it: Fai ciò che ti dice di fare il tuo cuore.

translation.en: I love you so much. Okay.
translation.it: - Ti voglio bene. - Ti voglio bene anch'io.

translation.en: Those darn telemarketers. They're the worst, right?
translation.it: Maledetti call center. Sono insopportabili, eh?

translation.en: Aiding and abetting a known fugitive is a federal crime.

translation.en: Where is he?
Lady, I'd just as soon swallow a bag of razor blades

translation.en: and chase it with some fresh lemon juice than to tell you jack shit.

translation.en: Ma'am, there's someone you should talk to.
[reporter on TV] The car, with Ernest the ghost inside,
translation.it: L'auto con Ernest a bordo ha sfrecciato per la città

translation.en: sped through the town in an attempt to evade authorities,
translation.it: L'auto con Ernest a bordo ha sfrecciato per la città nel tentativo di sfuggire alle autorità, causando svariati danni.

translation.en: causing damage all along the strip…
translation.it: nel tentativo di sfuggire alle autorità, causando svariati danni.

translation.en: What are you doing?
translation.it: - Che stai facendo? - Cerco il cadavere.

translation.en: Looking for the dead body. This room reeks.

translation.en: Rusty.
[Kevin] Oh my God.
Wait, this must be a mistake.
-Maybe I should take a dump on the bed. -[both laugh]
We could just share this one.
Sh… Share? Just don't try to dry hump me.
translation.it: - Dici? - Ma non strusciarti addosso a me.

translation.en: Oh! No, I… I would never… I… I… [laughs] I'm kidding.
translation.it: - No, non lo farei mai… - Scherzo.

translation.en: Come here. Grab the remote.
[reporter on TV] The global outcry continues with protests demanding the ethical treatment of Ernest.
translation.it: Continuano le proteste in tutto il mondo perché Ernest riceva un trattamento etico.

translation.en: -[man] I'd like to solve the puzzle! -[Pat] Go ahead.
-[man] Ernest the ghost. -[Pat] Yeah.
This is really a thing, huh?
[Pat] Wow. Look at this.
Look, it's not too late for you to get out of this. What?
translation.it: - Senti, puoi ancora tirartene fuori. - Cosa?

translation.en: I mean, everyone thinks you're kidnapped.
translation.it: Tutti pensano che tu sia stata rapita.

translation.en: You could just pretend you got away.
translation.it: - Potresti fingere di essere scappata. - Aspetta.

translation.en: You're saying I should just ditch you?
translation.it: Vuoi che vi pianti in asso?

translation.en: -Why would I do that? -So you don't go to jail, maybe?
translation.it: - Perché? - Per non finire in galera?

translation.en: [chuckles] It's a good reason.
Are you kidding? I was already in jail.
Band, AP classes, math tutoring, choir practice.
translation.it: Banda, corsi avanzati, ripetizioni di matematica, coro.

translation.en: My dad's programmed every second of my life, and it's exhausting.
translation.it: Mio padre ha programmato ogni secondo della mia vita. È sfiancante.

translation.en: [scoffs] At least your dad cares. It's a culture thing.
translation.it: - Almeno lui ci tiene a te. - È questione di cultura.

translation.en: We have to be the best.
Prove that we belong. It's bullshit.
translation.it: Dimostrare di meritare di stare qui. Tutte stronzate.

translation.en: Sometimes it just seems like he doesn't even know me.
translation.it: A volte ho l'impressione che non mi conosca nemmeno.

translation.en: He just sees this fake version of me that he created.
translation.it: Vede solo la finta versione di me che si è creato.

translation.en: I don't know. I guess it's what a lot of parents do.
translation.it: Non so, tanti genitori si comportano così.

translation.en: Try and fix themselves through their kids, but they just mess 'em up more in the end.
translation.it: Cercano di aggiustare se stessi tramite i figli, ma finiscono col fare danni.

translation.en: The sad thing is me and my dad were actually best friends when I was a kid.
translation.it: La cosa triste è che io e mio padre eravamo migliori amici, quand'ero piccolo.

translation.en: I miss that.
What happened? I don't know. It…
It wasn't just one thing. It was, like, a bunch of things over time, and…
translation.it: Non è stata una cosa sola, sono state tante nel corso del tempo.

translation.en: us moving around a lot,
translation.it: I continui traslochi, lui che faceva promesse a mia madre

translation.en: him promising things to my mom that just never happened.
translation.it: I continui traslochi, lui che faceva promesse a mia madre senza mai mantenerle. Vedere quanto questo la ferisse.

translation.en: Seeing how much it would hurt her.
translation.it: senza mai mantenerle. Vedere quanto questo la ferisse.

translation.en: After a while, I just pulled away.
translation.it: Dopo un po' mi sono allontanato.

translation.en: Sometimes I feel like I'm not even his son anymore.
translation.it: A volte non mi sento neanche più suo figlio.

translation.en: What?
You're just…
You're really cool.
Thank you for helping us.
[clears throat] I have to go to the restroom.
-Okay. -Just one sec.
Would you knock it off?
Ernest, stop.
Ernest. Listen to me. -What are you doing? Stop, Ernest. -[Randy as Ernest groans]
translation.it: Ernest, ascoltami. Che stai facendo? Smettila.

translation.en: -What? What is this? -Ah!
What?
-Everything okay? -Yeah. Yeah. [clears throat] Yeah.
Uh, everything's fine.
[inaudible] Go away.
I'll stay here.
Keep a lookout.
Honk the horn if you see anything suspicious.
translation.it: Suona il clacson se vedi qualcosa di sospetto.

translation.en: Stay out of sight, okay?
Hi.
Are you Ernest Scheller?
-I'm-- -I know who you are. Come in.
translation.it: - Io sono… - So chi sei. Entra.

translation.en: That's my wife, Ramona.
Suffered a stroke last year.
translation.it: Ha avuto un ictus l'anno scorso.

translation.en: Can't really do much these days.
translation.it: Non riesce più a fare molto ormai.

translation.en: Have a seat.
Can I get you something to drink?
Um, juice, pop, pineapple juice? Ramona loves pineapple juice. [chuckles]
translation.it: Un succo, una bibita, del succo d'ananas? Ramona adora il succo d'ananas.

translation.en: Whatever you want.
No, no. No, I'm fine.
[chuckles] Okay.
Funny thing, I, uh…
I was in a bowling league ages ago.
translation.it: Ero in una squadra di bowling, secoli fa.

translation.en: One day, I can't find my shirt.
translation.it: Un giorno, non trovo più la camicia.

translation.en: I looked high and low.
Ramona said I was always losing things,
translation.it: Ramona diceva che perdevo sempre tutto,

translation.en: even the damn shirt off my own back, but, uh…
translation.it: anche la camicia che avevo addosso, ma…

translation.en: I knew something wasn't right.
translation.it: io sapevo che c'era qualcosa di strano.

translation.en: I didn't see that shirt again
translation.it: Non l'ho più rivista fino a un paio di settimane fa,

translation.en: till a couple of weeks ago when I saw one of your videos on the TV.
translation.it: Non l'ho più rivista fino a un paio di settimane fa, quando hanno trasmesso i vostri video in TV.

translation.en: Well, I've seen some crazy things in my life, but this…
translation.it: Ne ho viste di cose assurde in vita mia, ma questa…

translation.en: I really can't believe this is real.
translation.it: Non riesco a credere che sia vero.

translation.en: His name was Randy. Randy McGovern.
That woman next to him was my wife's sister, Evelyn.
translation.it: La donna accanto a lui è la sorella di mia moglie, Evelyn.

translation.en: Dear, kind woman.
She died from, uh, complications in labor.
translation.it: Morì a causa di complicazioni durante il travaglio.

translation.en: He had a child? Daughter. June.
translation.it: - Aveva un figlio? - Una figlia. June.

translation.en: Randy, what happened to him?
Ramona and I never really wanted kids.
translation.it: Io e Ramona non abbiamo mai voluto figli.

translation.en: Just always thought we'd travel, see the world.
But life had other plans for us.
translation.it: Ma la vita aveva altri progetti per noi.

translation.en: After Evelyn died, Randy sort of fell apart, I guess.
translation.it: Dopo la morte di Evelyn, Randy non riuscì a riprendersi.

translation.en: Took to drinking.
Then one day, he showed up at our house with little June,
translation.it: E poi un giorno si presentò a casa nostra con la piccola June.

translation.en: said he had an appointment, needed us to watch her,
translation.it: Disse che aveva un appuntamento e ci chiese di badare a lei,

translation.en: but he never came back.
Just left that poor little girl with us. She was four.
translation.it: Ci lasciò quella povera bimba. Aveva quattro anni.

translation.en: Nobody ever heard from or saw that man again.
translation.it: Da allora nessuno ne seppe più nulla.

translation.en: Maybe something happened, like an accident or--
translation.it: Forse gli è successo qualcosa, un incidente o…

translation.en: Police found his car for sale at a used lot,
translation.it: La polizia trovò la sua auto da un rivenditore d'auto usate

translation.en: uh, his watch at a pawn shop.
translation.it: e il suo orologio a un banco dei pegni.

translation.en: He took my shirt,
my driver's license.
Might have used that to change his identity.
translation.it: Forse la usò per cambiare identità.

translation.en: What do you think happened? My guess, uh, drank himself to death.
translation.it: - Cosa pensa gli sia successo? - Secondo me, l'ha ucciso l'alcol.

translation.en: Suicide, maybe. Who knows?
It's… it's hard to feel much sympathy for somebody like that,
translation.it: È difficile provare compassione per uno così,

translation.en: abandoning their own motherless child.
translation.it: capace di abbandonare la figlia rimasta senza madre.

translation.en: I can't think of a greater sin than that.
translation.it: - Non penso esista peccato più grave. - No.

translation.en: No. No, no. No way. He wouldn't do something like that.
translation.it: No, è impossibile. Non lo farebbe mai.

translation.en: You said it yourself. He can't remember, right?
translation.it: L'hai detto tu stesso, non ricorda nulla.

translation.en: Maybe the reason he can't remember, because the truth, what he did,
translation.it: Forse la ragione per cui non ricorda è che la verità, ciò che ha fatto,

translation.en: is too unbearable.
Randy? That's you, isn't it?
Oh my God.
[Joy] Get away from me! Get away from me!
Ernest! Get out of here!
Get off me! [grunts] -Get off me! -[officer 1 grunts]
Go to thermal!
Light him up!
Ernest! Stop!
Stop! -Stop, you're hurting him! -[screaming]
Get your hands up! Hands up now!
Get 'em up! Ernest, no!
-On your feet, now! -No.
Where are you taking him?
Kevin.
[Melanie] Are you okay?
-Yeah. I'm fine. -Did they hurt you?
translation.it: - Sì. - Ti hanno fatto del male?

translation.en: -[Kevin] No. -Are you sure?
-Yeah. -Let's get you home.
I guess this worked out for you, huh?
I think, considering the situation, it's a pretty fair exchange, don't you?
translation.it: Considerata la situazione, è uno scambio equo, no?

translation.en: Now you and your family can go live a normal life.
translation.it: La sua famiglia può tornare alla normalità.

translation.en: -[door closes] -Hey.
Sorry about your car. It's just a car. You good though?
translation.it: - Scusa per la macchina. - È solo una macchina. Tu stai bene?

translation.en: Yeah.
[chuckles] I've been waiting for this moment for so long.
translation.it: Era da tanto che aspettavo questo momento.

translation.en: No, no, no. Stand down. I'm good.
translation.it: No. Giù le armi. Sto bene.

translation.en: Come on, just right this way. Ah, there she is.
translation.it: Venite, da questa parte. Ah, eccola qui.

translation.en: Ah, the woman of the hour.
Gentlemen… Oh, and lady,
please meet Dr. Leslie Monroe.
translation.it: vi presento la dottoressa Leslie Monroe.

translation.en: Oh, actually, I correct myself.
Agent Monroe.
She assisted us in capturing the asset you see before you.
translation.it: Ha collaborato alla cattura della risorsa che avete davanti.

translation.en: -Very good job, yes. -[clapping]
So, now-- No, please, please, just take a look.
translation.it: E ora… No, prego. Date un'occhiata.

translation.en: Of course you did more than just assist. That was just--
translation.it: Naturalmente ha più che collaborato, era solo per…

translation.en: What's the endgame?
-[Schipley] I'm sorry, endgame? -[Leslie] Well…
What are you gonna do with him?
Well, he's dead, so, uh…
whatever the hell we want.
Hi, um, is Kevin around?
I haven't seen him at school.
Uh, yeah, he's just taking a little break from stuff, honey.
translation.it: Si sta prendendo una piccola pausa, tesoro.

translation.en: Maybe come back another time? Yeah, okay.
translation.it: - Perché non torni un'altra volta? - Sì. Ok.

translation.en: [Kevin] It's okay, Mom.
Hey.
You haven't responded to any of my texts.
Yeah, I…
I haven't really felt like talking to anyone, so…
translation.it: non avevo voglia di parlare con nessuno.

translation.en: It's okay. I get it.
How is everything?
Well, I'm grounded until I'm 80, but other than that, super peachy.
translation.it: Sarò in punizione fino agli 80 anni, ma per il resto una favola.

translation.en: Um, I just… I wanted to check up on you.
Cool.
Thanks. No, really though. Are you doing okay?
translation.it: - Grazie. - Sul serio però, stai bene?

translation.en: Yeah.
I'm fine.
See you around.
Hey.
It's so quiet up here now.
translation.it: Che silenzio che c'è qui, adesso.

translation.en: Feels strange. [chuckles]
It was raining like this the day you were born.
translation.it: Pioveva così, il giorno in cui sei nato.

translation.en: I remember because I was driving your mom to the hospital,
translation.it: Me lo ricordo perché stavo portando la mamma in ospedale

translation.en: and traffic was so bad.
I thought she was gonna give birth right there in the car. I was petrified.
translation.it: Pensavo ti avrebbe partorito in macchina. Ero terrorizzato.

translation.en: I made a promise to myself that if we made it to the hospital…
translation.it: Mi sono fatto una promessa. Se fossimo arrivati in ospedale,

translation.en: I was gonna be the best dad in the world.
It's funny.
When your kids are little, it's easy to be a parent.
translation.it: Quando i figli sono piccoli, essere genitore è facile.

translation.en: They don't see who you actually are.
They just see the good stuff.
What you want them to see.
But eventually, as they grow up…
parts of yourself that you don't like become harder and harder to hide.
translation.it: diventa sempre più difficile nascondere ciò che non ti piace di te.

translation.en: I guess
I never really figured out who I am.
translation.it: di non aver mai capito bene chi sono.

translation.en: I've just always chased stuff.
New places, new jobs…
hoping something would click,
and I would finally be the man I wanted to be for you and Fulton…
translation.it: che mi rendesse finalmente chi volevo essere per te, per Fulton…

translation.en: and your mom.
But then Ernest came, and I was like,
translation.it: Poi è arrivato Ernest e ho pensato:

translation.en: "This is it."
I could finally…
have a purpose.
I could finally be worthy.
I lost myself all over again.
translation.it: Ma mi sono perso di nuovo.

translation.en: I let you down, kid.
I broke my promise.
I know you're upset about Ernest.
translation.it: So che sei triste per Ernest.

translation.en: But you tried to do the right thing, and that's all that matters.
translation.it: Ma hai cercato di fare la cosa giusta, ed è questo che conta.

translation.en: You're a better man at 16
translation.it: Sei un uomo migliore tu, a 16 anni,

translation.en: than I am at 45.
I admire you, Kevin.
You turned out great, in spite of me.
Can you face me, please? Turn towards me.
translation.it: Ti spiacerebbe guardarmi? Voltati verso di me.

translation.en: Turn around.
Turn around.
I said turn around.
Comply.
Comply.
I said comply! [echoes]
Comply!
Comply!
Yeah. Works on the living too.
[inaudible] Thank you. Get out of here.
-…figured it out. -Where is our Uber?
It's a Lyft, stupid.
-You're stupid, Tara. -Oh my God!
-We're gonna get mugged and die out here. -No, no.
translation.it: Ci rapineranno e moriremo qui. - No, andrà tutto bene. - Andiamo da Taco Bell.

translation.en: -It's gonna be fine. -We should go to Taco Bell!
translation.it: - No, andrà tutto bene. - Andiamo da Taco Bell.

translation.en: -[all exclaim] -Yes!
-Wait, is that it? Oh my God! -Oh my God! Thank you!
translation.it: Aspettate, è quello? Oh, mio Dio! Grazie!

translation.en: Hi, hi, hi. -Is this for Gabby? -Uh-huh.
Holy shit, man!
Ernest, dude!
Uh, excuse me. This is my Uber.
translation.it: Chiedo scusa. Questo è il mio Uber.

translation.en: Uh, it's a Lyft, bitch.
Bye!
Wait!
Hell yeah! [laughs]
-So, which way you headed, Ernest? -[siren blaring]
You got it.
-[ominous music playing] -[man] I missed this house.
Randy, a ghost. [laughs] A goddamn ghost.
translation.it: Randy, un fantasma. Un maledetto fantasma.

translation.en: Fifty years… I've kept this secret.
translation.it: Per 50 anni ho mantenuto il segreto.

translation.en: But the chickens finally came home to roost.
translation.it: Ma i nodi sono finalmente venuti al pettine.

translation.en: I don't know anything. I swear.
translation.it: Io non ne so niente, giuro.

translation.en: You're lying. You came after me.
-I was just trying to help him. -You're lying!
-Frank. Did you hear that? -Okay. All right. Yup, yup, yup.
Stay here.
-Be careful. -All right.
-What are you doing? -Thought I heard something!
Shit. [breathing heavily]
Me too.
Stay here. Yeah, right.
Come on.
Drop it.
Okay. Okay, take it easy.
Please don't hurt my son. It was Ramona's idea.
translation.it: - Non faccia del male a mio figlio. - Fu un'idea di Ramona.

translation.en: She couldn't have kids of her own, and when her sister died,
translation.it: Non poteva avere figli, così quando sua sorella morì

translation.en: she said it was a sign from God
translation.it: disse che era un segno di Dio,

translation.en: that Randy couldn't take care of June without her mother.
translation.it: che Randy non poteva crescere June senza una madre.

translation.en: She made me do it. I didn't want to. She made me.
translation.it: Mi costrinse a farlo. Io non volevo, mi costrinse.

translation.en: We can talk about this. Just put the gun down.
translation.it: Parliamone. Però metta giù la pistola.

translation.en: -Don't! -Okay, okay.
[Melanie] Frank, what's happening?
[Frank] Get him out of here!
-Dad! -Let's go!
-Dad! -[Fulton] Come on!
Get away from them!
Go to Mom!
-Come on! -Stop it!
-Kevin, no! -[Kevin] Get in!
Kevin, no! Kevin!
Kevin! No! Please! [Kevin] Stay inside! Call the cops!
translation.it: - Kevin, no! Per favore! - Resta lì! Chiama la polizia!

translation.en: Little Junebug. [chuckles]
She made Ramona so happy.
That's all she really wanted was her own little girl.
translation.it: Tutto ciò che voleva era una bambina tutta sua.

translation.en: She doesn't talk to us anymore.
Maybe deep down she knows…
translation.it: Forse in cuor suo sa tutto.

translation.en: [grunts] What?
I killed you!
I knew you'd come back.
-[Frank screams] -Dad, no!
Kevin.
Okay. I got you. You okay?
-Yeah. -Okay.
[Melanie] Frank! Kevin! Oh, thank God! Thank God.
translation.it: Frank! Kevin! Oh, grazie a Dio!

translation.en: [Schipley] And that was it?
This ghost that was haunting your house for, what, 50 years, just suddenly…
translation.it: Il fantasma che ha infestato casa vostra per 50 anni, così all'improvviso…

translation.en: he's gone?
It was dark.
It was raining. It was hard to see, but… I… I looked around, and he wasn't there.
translation.it: Pioveva, non si vedeva niente, ma… mi sono guardato intorno e lui non c'era.

translation.en: Why… why would he just vanish like that?
I don't know. Maybe he didn't need to be here anymore.
translation.it: Non lo so. Forse non aveva più motivo di restare.

translation.en: Found the guy who killed him
and got closure.
What really happened, Kevin?
Hi, Daddy.
[Kevin] Oh, nice. Okay, let me try. Let's see.
translation.it: Oh, fico. Ok, fammi provare. Vediamo…

translation.en: I suck. Okay.
Bye, Ernest.
[Schipley] Kevin.
Tell me what happened.
[Fulton] Hey, sorry I can't be there.
Oh yeah. I'm sure you're just devastated.
translation.it: Sì, sono certa che ti spezza il cuore.

translation.en: -[Fulton laughs] -Why aren't you studying, boy?
translation.it: Sì, sono certa che ti spezza il cuore. - Perché non stai studiando? - Papà, è sabato. Per favore.

translation.en: Dad, come on. It's a Saturday. Please.
translation.it: - Perché non stai studiando? - Papà, è sabato. Per favore.

translation.en: Yeah, and what the hell is a Saturday? -Go study. -Uh-huh.
translation.it: Che diamine è il sabato? Vai a studiare.

translation.en: But I feel bad for whoever has to deal with this shitty attic.
translation.it: Mi spiace per chi erediterà questo schifo di soffitta.

translation.en: You know, I don't really think I'm down with you not being my neighbor anymore.
translation.it: Sai, non mi sta bene che tu non sia più il mio vicino.

translation.en: Well, I'm only like five miles away.
translation.it: Beh, sarò a soli otto chilometri da qui.

translation.en: -[Joy chuckles] -Plus, I get my car soon. Okay. Smell you, bitch.
translation.it: - E poi presto avrò una macchina. - Ok, levati di torno.

translation.en: I know. Ka-ching! Haunted houses are a thing now.
translation.it: Dlin-dlin! Le case infestate vanno a ruba.

translation.en: Figured I'd find you two up here. -Dad. -[Melanie chuckles]
translation.it: - Sapevo che vi avrei trovati qui. - Papà.

translation.en: Hey, the truck is loaded. It's time to say goodbye.
translation.it: Il camion è pronto. È l'ora dei saluti.

translation.en: Uh, last chance for y'all to do whatever y'all were doing or gonna do before you did.
translation.it: Vi conviene sbrigarvi a fare ciò che stavate facendo o stavate per fare.

translation.en: -Stop it. -Last chance.
Please save me.
-[Kevin] Thank you. -I got this.
Come on. See you downstairs.
-Thank you. -[Frank] Bye.
-Yes, great. -[Frank] However you say bye.
-My… my parents. -Mm-hmm.
[Joy] What are you thinking about?
Do you think he can still see us?
Wherever he is?
[Joy] I don't know.
Maybe.
